posts.title: Post test
posts.content:
This is a post test

we offer a discount of 1 free meal (with purchase of meal of equal or greater value and 2 beverages)
posts.excerpt: This is a post test we offer a discount of 1 free meal (with purchase of meal of equal or greater value and 2 beverages)

posts.title: Hello world!
posts.content: Welcome to WordPress. This is your first post. Edit or delete it, then start blogging!
posts.excerpt: Welcome to WordPress. This is your first post. Edit or delete it, then start blogging!

comments.name: Mr WordPress
comments.content:
Hi, this is a comment.
To delete a comment, just log in and view the post's comments. There you will have the option to edit or delete them.
